posts.post_content: At this point, that 1 toughness doesn't matter quite so much, because he's already got 2 power at 2 CMC. [Dark Confidant](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Dark Confidant) is a 2/1 for 2, so he's just as vulnerable, but he fits the curve perfectly. This guy is a great early drop that's relevant at all times, and if your opponent wastes removal on it, bad move on their part.

Posted By: DacenOctavio (9/10/2011 11:36:23 PM)

posts.post_content:
I prefer [stun sniper](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=stun sniper), though that might be because I don't use any soldier synergy.  
  
When I used this guy, I often had the problem of being able to stop a giant creature from attacking but then having to face against it as a blocker. Stun sniper removed that problem, and added in a bonus point of damage, all for ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol).  
  
Though, his 2 power might make him better as an attacker, but I prefer people like [boros swiftblade](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=boros swiftblade) for that kind of job.  
  
Overall, not a bad card, but it just doesn't agree with me.
posts.html:

When I used this guy, I often had the problem of being able to stop a giant creature from attacking but then having to face against it as a blocker. Stun sniper removed that problem, and added in a bonus point of damage, all for .

Overall, not a bad card, but it just doesn't agree with me.
